#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,t,k,flag;
	cin>>t;
	int answer[t];
	//fflush(stdin);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		answer[i]=0;
		flag=0;
		char ch[105];
		cin>>ch;
		ch[strlen(ch)+1] = '\0';	
		for(k=0;ch[k]!='\0';k++)
		{
			if(flag==6)
			{
				flag=0;
				continue;
			}
			else
			{
				if(ch[k]=='L' || ch[k]=='l')
				{
					answer[i]=answer[i]+4;
					++flag;
				}	
				else if(ch[k]=='M' || ch[k]=='m')
				{
				answer[i]=answer[i]+3;
				++flag;
				}
			}	
		}	
	}
	cout<<endl;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		cout<<answer[i]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
